select hd.dept_code,hd.dept_name,sum(t.money) money,sum(cddd.dir_amount) dir_amount,sum(ccw.clinic_num) climic_num
${sql}
from (select cid.group_id,cid.hos_id,cid.copy_code,substr(cid.year_month, 1, 4) year_month,cid.appl_dept_id ,cid.appl_dept_no ,sum(cid.money) money from COST_INCOME_DETAIL cid
cid.group_id = #{group_id} and
cid.hos_id = #{hos_id} and
cid.copy_code = #{copy_code}
and substr(cid.year_month,1,4) between #{first_year} and #{last_year}
group by cid.group_id,cid.hos_id,cid.copy_code,cid.appl_dept_id, cid.appl_dept_no,cid.year_month) t left join COST_CLINIC_WORK ccw on ccw.group_id = t.group_id and ccw.hos_id = t.hos_id and ccw.copy_code = t.copy_code and ccw.acc_year_month = t.year_month and ccw.dept_id = t.appl_dept_id and ccw.dept_no = t.appl_dept_no left join COST_DEPT_DRI_DATA cddd on t.group_id = cddd.group_id and t.hos_id = cddd.hos_id and t.copy_code = cddd.copy_code and t.year_month = cddd.year_month and t.appl_dept_id = cddd.dept_id and t.appl_dept_id = cddd.dept_no left join hos_dept hd on t.group_id = hd.group_id and t.hos_id = hd.hos_id and t.appl_dept_id = hd.dept_id left join ACC_DEPT_ATTR ada on ada.group_id = hd.group_id and ada.hos_id =hd.hos_id and hd.dept_id = ada.dept_id
ada.type_code = #{dept_type} and
ada.natur_code = #{dept_nature} and
group by hd.dept_code,hd.dept_name order by hd.dept_code
